comment: She's so sweet and hilarious. One of my favorite professors I have had.

I enjoyed having Professor Lewis. She was bubbly and loud and fun. She is understanding but she does not deal with any nonsense. Do your work and go to class and you should be fine. I liked this class a lot.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: horrid teacher. she is always right, no matter what you think.

She's a very nice woman with a bubbly personality. Class usually starts with notes and ends with some activity that's fun to do/watch. She also gives about 3 extra credit opportunities. We had to go to about 3 plays, read about 3 scripts, and take about 10 quizzes with 10 questions each, not including the 35 question online exams (2). I had fun!
